name: factombip44
description: Bip44 implmentation for Factom. Just generates private keys

scripts.example: browserify examples/examples.js -s Util -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > dist/examples.js && node dist/examples.js
scripts.fb44: browserify-transform-cli examples/fb44.js -s Util -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > dist/fb44.js && node dist/fb44.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:docs && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: browserify -r ./index.js -s Util -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > dist/factombip44.js

author: emyrk
